cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_INSTREAMS to -1 (must be positive) will cause SCTP configuration failure and prevent F1 interface establishment.

du.explanation_en: Setting physCellId to 1008 (valid range 0-1007) will cause cell identity configuration validation failure and prevent cell setup.
du.explanation_zh: 將 physCellId 設定為 1008（有效範圍 0-1007）會導致小區身份配置驗證失敗，並阻止小區設置。
